name: SPACEDEV
description: Space Development Consulting Limited—design and build, space remodeling, project and construction management. Premier consulting firm delivering excellence across Nigeria.

footer.tagline: Setting the gold standard in high-end construction and modern architecture.

team.name: Marcus Thorne
team.shortBio: 20+ years in structural engineering. Visionary behind our sustainable development framework.
team.fullProfile: Marcus founded SPACEDEV in 2010 with a mission to bring sustainable, modular architecture to the forefront of construction. With over two decades in structural engineering across Europe and Africa, he has led the design of multiple LEED-certified towers and pioneered our net-zero construction framework. Marcus holds a PhD in Structural Engineering from Imperial College London and serves on several industry boards focused on sustainable building standards.

team.name: Elena Rodriguez
team.shortBio: Pioneer in 3D-printing tech for construction. Leading our digital twin initiatives.
team.fullProfile: Elena joined SPACEDEV in 2016 to lead our technology and innovation division. She has been instrumental in integrating 3D-printing and robotic fabrication into our construction pipeline, and currently drives our digital twin and BIM initiatives across all major projects. Previously, she led R&D at a global construction tech firm and holds patents in additive manufacturing for building materials. Elena holds an MSc in Computational Design from MIT.

team.name: David Chen
team.shortBio: Award-winning architect focused on bio-mimetic design and urban regeneration.
team.fullProfile: David leads SPACEDEV's design studio and has been responsible for some of our most acclaimed projects, including the Innovation District headquarters. His work in bio-mimetic design and urban regeneration has earned multiple international awards. Before joining in 2014, he ran his own practice in Singapore and taught at the National University. David is a RIBA Chartered Architect and holds a Master's in Urban Design from Harvard GSD.

team.name: Amara Okonkwo
team.shortBio: Ensures seamless delivery across all projects. Expert in supply chain and site management.
team.fullProfile: Amara oversees project delivery and operations across SPACEDEV's portfolio. With 15 years in construction management and supply chain optimization, she has streamlined our procurement and site execution processes, reducing delivery times while maintaining the highest quality standards. She previously held senior roles at two major Nigerian developers and holds an MBA from Lagos Business School and a BEng in Civil Engineering.

team.name: Sarah Mitchell
team.shortBio: Champions green building and circular economy practices across every project.
team.fullProfile: Sarah drives SPACEDEV's sustainability strategy and ensures our projects meet the strictest environmental and social governance criteria. She has led certification efforts for multiple LEED Platinum and BREEAM Outstanding buildings. Before joining in 2017, she worked with international NGOs on sustainable housing in emerging markets. Sarah holds an MSc in Environmental Engineering and is a LEED Fellow and BREEAM Assessor.

team.name: James Adeyemi
team.shortBio: Leads finance and strategy. Former investment banker with deep infrastructure experience.
team.fullProfile: James joined SPACEDEV as CFO in 2019, bringing two decades of experience in infrastructure finance and M&A. He has structured funding for some of our largest projects and leads our investor relations and strategic planning. Previously, he was a director at a leading investment bank covering construction and real estate across Africa. James is a Chartered Accountant and holds an MBA from INSEAD.

services.title: Design & Build
services.shortDescription: From client brief to construction—conceptual design, drawings, documentation, construction, and full contract management.
services.alt: Design and build—conceptual design to construction

services.title: Project Management
services.shortDescription: Facilitation of project delivery, construction and remodeling works, process overhaul, cost and contract management, planning and scheduling.

services.title: Consulting
services.shortDescription: Architectural consultancy, planning and scheduling of complex projects, monitoring and control systems, risk analysis and tool evaluation.
items: Planning and scheduling of complex projects
Design of project monitoring and control systems

profile.coreServicesSummary: Design and build, space remodeling, project and construction management.
profile.approachSummary: We adopt a systems approach to design and build—our core offering—whereby all projects are broken down into design resolutions, planning and construction phases. We ensure maximum economy in cost, time and quality, and give maximum value to the client.
profile.philosophy: Consistently with our philosophy of giving maximum value to the client, we have continually ensured that all our procedures in both design and project management are fully computerized.

milestones.title: Foundation
milestones.description: Space Development Consulting Limited was formed to render services in design and build, space remodeling, project and construction management.

milestones.title: CAC Registration
milestones.description: Registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission (February 2005).

milestones.title: Today
milestones.description: Fully computerized procedures and integrated project delivery; our competitive edge shines through in every final product.

competitiveEdge.title: Diversity & Integrity
competitiveEdge.description: The diversity in knowledge, skills and experience of our key staff, coupled with competence, character and integrity, shines through in the final product every time.

competitiveEdge.title: Decisive & Responsive
competitiveEdge.description: Decisiveness, responsiveness and flexibility in service delivery.

competitiveEdge.title: Committed Teams
competitiveEdge.description: A holistic evaluation, motivation and reward system ensures our staff are not only committed but synergistic in the discharge of their assignments.

howWeWork.title: Define scope
howWeWork.description: Project scope is defined from a careful identification of objectives in terms of time, budget and technical requirements.

howWeWork.title: Plan
howWeWork.description: Detailed planning in terms of cost, time and quality is undertaken to give life to the project. Change management criteria is clarified with the client before implementation.

howWeWork.title: Execute
howWeWork.description: After a satisfactory action plan is determined, we proceed to execution—with feedback to planning as the project evolves. Progress on time, quality, expenditure and scope is reported to key stakeholders periodically.

about.mission: We deliver world-class construction and development solutions—from landmark commercial buildings to sustainable residential communities—transforming visions into reality across Nigeria and beyond.
about.whoWeAre: Space Development Consulting Limited is a premier construction and development consulting firm headquartered in Lagos. We were formed in 2003 to deliver design and build, space remodeling, and project and construction management.

whyChooseUs.description: Since 2003—structural excellence and trusted delivery across the nation.
